author: Joel H.
body: Excellent service, very thorough and professional. Would definitely use again!

author: Michael Puleo
body: Matt went above and beyond on my water heater issue and replacement. I would highly recommend.

author: Ami Amada
body: Working with Matt is a pleasure.  He was a second opinion and uncovered previously done shoddy work, which was ultimately causing leaking. He diagnosed everything spot on, was timely and I will not hesitate to use or recommend him to ...

author: Jim Dubinski
body: PlumbPRO Services installed a whole home water filtration system and water softener in early 2019.  Water in Ambler borough is very hard and we needed a professional to explain all the different options that were available get softer ...

author: Margaret Hobe
body: Great service! Have called Plumb Pro twice so far and both times Matt has been great. Punctual, efficient, knowledgeable and fair. Matt gave me some advice that saved me a lot of money.  He also estimated a couple future projects for me ...

author: Maria Macaluso
body: Excellent experience working with Plumbpro!   They were on time, efficient, courteous and knowledgeable .  What I especially loved is that we were given options for each repair needed so that we could make an informed decision about the ...

author: Anthony Cafagna
body:
Great job and personality 
Honest and concerned 
Would definitely recommend for any plumbing work

author: Andy Tumolo
body: I had two great experiences with PlumbPRO Services in December 2018. Scheduling was very easy and Matt and Amanda were extremely responsive. Matt was very friendly and knowledgeable. He also spent the time to explain what the issues were ...

author: Wendy Cheatham
body: I had a great experience using PlumbPro Services. Matt answered an emergency call at my home. He was knowledgeable and professional. I would recommend his services.

author: Jean Miksch
body: Matt kept us informed and helped us understand the need and benefit of each part of the service. We appreciate his expertise and fair and upfront pricing! Thanks!

author: christopher peffall
body: Great work, very honest, super friendly and is available when your emergency happens - thanks Matt!!

author: Nancy Shaw
body: Matt was extremely nice. Very professional and considerate. Did an awesome job on our trap repair and cleaned up after himself. Would use him again in a heart beat. Strongly recommend his service.

author: Lisa Marie Rambo
body: PlumbPRO Services made it to my home within the hour! He was fast and knew exactly how to fix the problem. I would highly recommend this company for their professionalism, experience and how fast they could make it to our home. Great job!

author: Erica Spierings
body: Matt was very accommodating and provided multiple times and dates to fix some pipes in my home. He uses an app to schedule the appointment assuring the time works for you. Also, on the app, he lets you know what time he should be ...

author: Stacey Efkowitz
body: Thank you Matt for coming out first thing Christmas Eve morning.  Arriving quickly and repairing what you could, you were knowledgeable and considerate. While we ultimately needed a well service, the work you did in advance was well done at a fair price.

author: Drew Kersic
body: Matt is a down to earth guy. He really knows his stuff when it comes to your plumbing needs. I can't wait to get him to my home for my next project. He attentive to customer needs and will share knowledge of what going on in a way you can understand. Really cant say enough nices things. Keep up the good work!

author: Greg Conner
body: Matt installed a new toilet and shut off valve. High quality work and very friendly.

author: Joan Schick
body: From the first contact with PlumbPRO, I knew this was going to be a positive experience.  I spoke with with Amanda in the office and I explained the work I needed done.  She was knowledgeable, proficient and friendly.  The next step was ...

author: Gail Parker
body: I found Matt to be very nice and efficient. I would definitely recommend him for any type of plumbing job. Amanda called me back very quickly. It was a pleasure working with them!!!

author: Chad Rosenthal
body: I’m afraid to lose him.... he’s that good!  Thorough, prompt, just a great experience all around, always!

author: Fran Pahlevani
body: Very responsive and on time. Matt did a great job detecting the problem and fixing it. Great services overall.

author: Beth Blumberg
body: Very responsive, professional, and thorough. Came at the time scheduled and was wonderful to deal with. Will use them again both here and in our new home!

author: Brian Smith
body: We can’t say enough great things about Matt and Amanda. The scheduling process was quick and easy with Amanda. Matt was great with identifying our plumbing issues and is very thorough from start to finish. They follow up with you after ...

author: C Drinkwater
body: Great service. Very professional. Explained everything thoroughly. Will definitely use again!

author: Jay Regan
body: Can't say enough good things about Matt, he did a job for us and was friendly, knowledgeable, neat, and thorough. I would highly recommend his services.

author: Jillian Sanchez
body: PlumbPro made getting the chore of scheduling home improvements easy. I was so appreciative of an evening appointment to get a quote and the quick turn around-time in receiving the quote. My messages and calls were always quickly ...

author: Francine Litz
body: Amanda and Matthew run a very professional and well-managed business.  They work as a team and provide the best service I've ever experienced in my 28 years of owning a home.  Matthew installed a new toilet yesterday and also assessed ...

author: Jennifer Oltman
body: Thank you Matt for fixing our leaking pipe immediately and giving us excellent information for future work. Matt didn’t try to sell me anything or make me feel like I was in immediate danger of something (which others have done). He was ...

author: Megan bustraan
body: I had a great experience with PlumbPRO Services.  They came out this morning and texted me while Matthew was on his way.  The work was done efficiently and the bathroom was kept clean.  They explained the issue to me, and are following ...

author: Lyndsey Pluss
body: Matt was wonderful. Very quick to respond to my request for service. Incredibly flexible with timing of proving service. Very friendly and easy to work with during every step of the way. Solved our problems completely. Went above and ...

author: Danielle Schneider
body: Matt from PlumbPRO Services SAVED my family not one but TWO nights in a row. The first, a cold snowy evening and the second a Friday night at 8:00 pm. Matt is very knowledgeable, professional and kind. He came in to our home, explained ...

author: Liran G
body: CALL HIM!. From the very start communication was awesome. Matt came here to diagnose a plumbing situation the very next day after I approached him, did great work, which he stood behind after I asked him to check a noise coming from the ...

author: Karen Beck
body: Matt came out quickly to install a shut-off valve behind my fridge so I could have it removed. After it was installed he called to make sure everything went well.  When I told him they still hadn’t hooked up the water he came back and ...

author: Dallas Chase
body: PlumbPRO is a great company. Very nice and easy to work with. I highly recommend Matt and his team.

author: Mara Scaliti
body: Awesome service!!

author: Gary Weller
body: When I started my renovations in my den, I completely planned on doing everything myself.  Once I removed the old drains in the bathroom, I realized that it was a little more than I could handle.  So I called PlumbPro.  Matt came by just ...

author: Greg Shields
body: Matt from PlumbPRO Services saved my bacon. Our water heater sprung a leak on a Sunday morning. That’s when these things always happen, isn’t it? However, that’s when it’s impossible to get a plumber. We went on social media and someone ...

author: Kristy Williams
body: I asked around if anyone knew a good plumber and several people recommended PlumbPRO.   We called  late in the afternoon when we got home from work and noticed we had no hot water. Matt came out that evening to take a look. He explained ...

author: Christine Calef
body:
Matt was very professional and dedicated to our job.  He walked us through the estimate, working with both our timeframe and budget, being helpful and not pushy.  

At time of service (Whole house filter), he arrived on time, worked ...

author: Jen Logan
body: Get service and very fast and knowledable in all areas of plumbing. Very friendly and job done right I would highly recommend plum pro services to everyone! Thanks

author: Dr BUDI Budich
body: Matt has a very calm and professional demeanor, and took extra time to examine our plumbing issue, and explain all options to properlly fix our leaking shower. We appreciated that he was thorough yet efficient, as we have a newborn who ...

author: Joy Rowan
body: Our hot water heater stopped working on a Saturday (of course!). Matt was contacted and showed up within a hour. Amazing. Figured out it was unrepairable and spent the entire rest of the afternoon and evening replacing it. He went out of ...

author: Rebecca Meyer
body: Matt is a hard worker and such a conscientious person. He is extremely knowledgeable and has given us great advice on solving water problems at our house. He took the time to patiently explain terms to my mom and to ease her anxiety. Matt and Amanda of PlumbPRO are super helpful!!

author: Michael Klouda
body: Matt from PlumbPRO has been a great find. We have been looking for a good plumber after having several bad experiences. Matt came recommended, responded very quickly, and the project from our initial conversation to a complete install of ...

author: Holly Schmutz
body: Matt is awesome! I texted him after business hours and he replied immediately. He came out the next day and was able fix my kitchen sink right away. Matt was very professional, didn’t leave any messes behind, worked quickly and ...

author: Nancy Amoroso
body: Matt has done several emergency jobs at our home.  He is always polite and  conscientious, anxious to help.  One of the things I value in workers entering my home is that they respect my property and leave it the way or in better ...

author: J Sweeney
body: Literally came to my house in the middle of an impending snow storm to fix my sump pump that had decided that was the best time to stop working. Great workmanship, kind and dedicated person!

author: Sarah Laws
body: Matt is professional, knowledgeable, and thorough. We have been very pleased with his work.

author: Adam Wilson
body: I have had Matt chandler come service my house several times, each with a new nuisance of complications . From a leaky back bathroom drain to installing my new dishwasher , he was considerate and pleasant every time . With all the people ...

author: Austin Lynch
body: Matt came out promptly to help us replace our leaky expansion tank last week. Quick and professional - thanks PlumbPRO!

author: Shane Dougherty
body: Matt knows his stuff inside and out. He will take the time to explain details if you ask. Always quick responses and easy to set up an appointment. Would recommend!

author: Amanda Wilson
body: Matt Chandler is my go to plumber. Not only is he friendly & pleasant to chat with,but he is quick to help you & get the job done without charging you more than you should be paying. I have known Matt for several years, & have followed ...

author: Jim Olsen
body: PlumbPRO replaced a water heater, sump pump, and  utility sink pump for me. I've always been completely satisfied with their work.

author: Daphne D'Barker
body: Had a great experience when I texted Matt about hot water heater in rental unit on Sunday afternoon.  He responded readily made appointment for 630.arrived right on time said he could be back in an hour with replacement and he was.  He ...

author: Cindi Willis
body: Matt was fantastic. He was very patient in trying to find the leak on my shower. It has been leaking for several months now. I have had multiple people come out to look st it. They all leave saying they will come back (they don’t) they ...

author: Jason Williams
body: Matt is very professional, trustworthy, and honest. He is a straight shooter and does not try to charge you for stuff you do not need. He is a hard worker and takes great pride in the quality of his work. He’s diligent in assessing a ...

author: Chris S
body: Really great service. We had a slow draining toilet and Matt came right over to fix it. He was clean and thorough, fixing our toilet so it worked right. Was very reasonably priced too.

author: Laurie Polter
body: What a great experience we had with Matt. Our master bathroom shower was leaking into our family room. Matt didn’t jump to opening the wall first. He searched for the most common problem first then then as a last resort he opened the ...
